column5: This place is conveniently located near UTSA, The Shops at La Cantera and The Rim â€”with a gasoline station, a restaurant patio bar, cafe, PitaPit and a barbershop, all within walking distances.  This space is clean, affordable and has everything you need if your in town visiting the University, on a shopping trip or simply need a place to crash for the night!   There is an assigned parking spot plus five visiter parking spaces and additional street parking.   Questions? Contact me anytime!
